location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran, to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 28 March 1853, William Taylour Thomson informs Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, that he has been presented to the Shah [Nāṣer al-Dīn Shāh Qājār] as Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia. The recto of the second folio of this letter is blank; however, there is a note on the verso of the second folio.
